message: Let's be fair and close the deal!
Let's be fair and close the deal! It's better than risking losing a good chunk of money in the next rounds.
You didn't take my first offer, now the stakes are higher!
I'm willing to compromise, but this is my final offer. Let's get this done before the inflation eats away any more of our money!
I'm not backing down! Inflation will hurt you more than me!
We're both losing money with each round. This is my final offer. Let's end this game and take what we can before it's too late.
